name: Minesweeper MRBL
description:
Minesweeper MRBL is a classic game that everyone knows, remade with vibrant graphics and global leaderboard.

Find all mines on the field without blowing up. Beat several premade levels or create your custom board.

Compete with other players and climb the leaderboard ladder!

To participate in leaderboards, you must set scores on mobile device. Download Minesweeper MRBL for free from AppStore or Google Play.
